backend/main.mo: Motoko canister combining access control and blob storage mixins, with user profile storage and protected query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing build‑related tasks, associated components, and verification artifacts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and build docs.
frontend/BUILD_VERIFICATION.md: Markdown guide outlining prerequisites and steps for verifying successful frontend builds.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with theme support, global layout, and page structure.
frontend/src/components/files/FileUpload: Authenticated file upload UI with selection, upload mutation handling, and status alerts.
frontend/src/components/files/UploadedFi: Displays authenticated user’s uploaded files with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright, attribution, and a dynamic caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/GoldenSpl: Layout component applying a responsive golden‑ratio split between major and minor sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with branding, Internet Identity auth controls, and query cache clearing on sign‑out.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a placeholder example React Query hook that waits for an actor before running.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserFiles.ts: Hooks for listing and uploading user files, currently using placeholders until backend methods exist.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/goldenRatio.ts: Exports golden ratio constants and a helper to convert ratios to percentage strings.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page layout showing features, file upload panels, and hero content, gated by authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH theme colors, extended animations, container settings, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, issues, and features for a Study Mate Pro app including file uploads, AI processing, and branding notes.
